channel.title: What happened to my idols?
channel.description: Seriously, what happened to my idols, that I used to idolise with such an unhealthy regiment it wasn't funny! I remember the good old days when people like PaulT would make you think, question and quire! Unlucky the shit that plagues our General Discussion today. I saw a total up rising and turn Mopar into what it used to be! Viva la cliqued revolution! In other news, I'm bored and need some intelligent comments, I need people like lawl and xerxes! EDIT: OMG TREE POSTED ON THE THREAD

item.title: What happened to my idols?
item.dc:creator: @teh_spede Teh Spede

[quote=“Pookey71, post:1, topic:221844”]Seriously, what happened to my idols, that I used to idolise with such an unhealthy regiment it wasn’t funny!
I remember the good old days when people like PaulT would make you think, question and quire! Unlucky the shit that plagues our General Discussion today.
I saw a total up rising and turn Mopar into what it used to be!
Viva la cliqued revolution!
In other news, I’m bored and need some intelligent comments, I need people like lawl and xerxes!
EDIT: OMG TREE POSTED ON THE THREAD[/quote]
I’m here <3<3<3

Read full topic

item.title: What happened to my idols?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

goatee:

I want PaulT and HexKey to come back :(. HexKey is only on IRC.

Fuck yeah I miss Hexkey, and PaulT a bit.

Pookey71:

Hi i cba to make this a big quote, so just pretend the Original post is here.

Probably the main reason you don’t idolize people any more is because you are not a newfag any more.

Read full topic

item.title: What happened to my idols?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

If writing a couple of Aryan scripts makes you fairly capable at Java, I must be a god

item.title: What happened to my idols?
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

[quote=“Algas, post:15, topic:221844”][quote author=Tree link=topic=291325.msg2347924#msg2347924 date=1216819837]

Xerxes knows what he is doing.

@Algas: You seem to forget how much Xerxes did contribute to Kaits. Who can blame him for acting like a moron on a messed up community?

How much did he contribute on kaitnieks.com?!?!? WTF. Its true that he did not post only crap on kaitnieks.com but most of what he ever did was wine and acted like a freaking eleven year old.
I can’t remember anything good he did here just opposites. I don’t accept the kind of act that xerxes had even from my little brother (who is 9). Maybe he has some intelligent comments but what the fuck… My little brother (who still is 9) knows some manners!

Find one mature person from a community before this that still actively posts here and i will eat my own hat. Even i find myself resorting to flames these days.
[/quote]
But there is a different to be a immature and to not have brains at all![/quote]

There is no doubt that he shows large amount of immaturity, though there have been plenty of time where he has shown a fair bit of intelligence. He is fairly capable of Java and has a fair bit of general knowledge. To be honest, i don’t even know why i am defending him but shrugs.

Speaking of greetings, welcome back.

Read full topic

item.title: What happened to my idols?
item.dc:creator: @pookey71 Pookey71
item.description:
@pookey71 wrote:

Thug-life:

As if, he hasnt been near the mopar community for months and everytime i used to be in #l0l he was as stupid as ever.

Well the simple fact that 1) #l0l and #mopar used to be on dairc, hence he was near the #mopar community (In a sense :P) and 2) Nearly all the cool people who lurked on #l0l where in #mopar at the time sorta makes me think you’re wrong (But I love you still :D)

Read full topic
